description:
Customer is required to have an electric hot water heat. Customer will install a separate electric meter and meter base to monitor the heating system. The Municipal provides the meter, meter base, and current transformer. The customer provides installation labor and wire. The customer will allow inspection of the wiring and meter annually. The customer agrees to allow the municipal to add the heat service to any load management program in the future. The foregoing rates for each KWH shall be increased by $.011 for each $.010 that the combined cost of fuel and energy purchased per KWH exceeds $.045 per KWH. Adjustments for the cost of fuel and energy purchased shall be made monthly and shall be based upon the average cost of fuel and energy purchased during the preceding month.
This rate is only applicable from November through May. The original rate of the customer will be applicable in the rest of the year.
The reading from this meter will be subtracted from the main meter readings for billing purposes.
energycomments: The rate will start with the monthly reading in November and end with the monthly reading in May. For all other readings, reflected by a cost of $0.0 per KWH in this rate, the customer will be charged for their normal rates.

name: Seasonal Heat Commercial(Separate meter)
